thread.title: Former UBS Executive to Pay Insider-Trading Fine in Singapore
thread.title_full: Former UBS Executive to Pay Insider-Trading Fine in Singapore - WSJ

author: Jake Maxwell Watts
title: Former UBS Executive to Pay Insider-Trading Fine in Singapore
text:
SINGAPORE—Singapore’s central bank said Wednesday it had taken a civil-penalty action against a top executive working at UBS Group AG’s Indonesia office for insider trading.
The Monetary Authority of Singapore said Vincent Rajiv Louis—a former managing director and head of investment-banking operations at UBS in Indonesia—had admitted to using nonpublic information to buy shares of a listed bank that was the target of an acquisition...
